title: Malcolm-Jamal Warner opens up about Cosby allegations - Barriere Star Journal
text:
There are 1 comment on the Barriere Star Journal story from 3 hrs ago, titled Malcolm-Jamal Warner opens up about Cosby allegations . In it, Barriere Star Journal reports that:
Actor and musician Malcolm-Jamal Warner poses for a portrait Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Los Angeles. Warner, who won his first Grammy earlier this year for his work on Robert Glasper's A A AoeJesus Children,A A A is currently promoting his new album, A A AoeSelfless.A A A He describes the third record with his band Miles Long as A A Aoefunky passionate vulnerability.A A A LOS ANGELES - "The Cosby Show" alum Malcolm-Jamal Warner says the series' legacy is "tarnished" by the sexual assault allegations made against Bill Cosby.
Join the discussion below, or Read more at Barriere Star Journal.
